meanings.definition: A person that helps to stop fires from burning buildings or other property.
examples: Firefighters are trying to stop the wildfires in California.

images.alt: Photo of two firefighters putting water on a fire.
images.description: Two people dressed in heavy, fireproof suits. They are holding a large hose and aiming water at a fire.
images.caption: Firefighters putting water on a fire.

meanings.definition: People who stop crime and keep public order.
examples: The police officers arrested the thief.

images.alt: Photo of two police officers and a motorcycle.
images.description: Two police officers. One sits on a motorcycle. The other stands next to the motorcycle.
images.caption: Police officers with a motorcycle.

source.title: Standing Police Man Beside Another Man Who Seats of Police Motorcycle
source.author: Ludmila Aleksandra

meanings.definition: Someone with a medical degree who helps people become or stay healthy.
examples: The doctor gave us shots so that we would not get the flu.

images.alt: Photo of a doctor looking at x-ray pictures.
images.description: A doctor looking at x-ray pictures.
images.caption: This doctor looks at x-ray pictures to check for signs of illness.

meanings.definition: Someone who takes care of sick people in a hospital.
examples: The nurse checked to make sure the patient was comfortable.

images.alt: Photo of a person taking blood with a needle
images.description: A person with gloves using a needle to take blood from a patient.
images.caption: A nurse, wearing gloves, uses a needle to take blood from a patient's arm.

meanings.definition: Someone who takes care of peopleâ€™s teeth.
examples: My dentist checked to make sure all my teeth were healthy.

images.alt: Photo of a person looking into another person's mouth.
images.description: A person wearing a uniform stands. She holds instruments and places them in a seated person's mouth.
images.caption: This dentist checks the teeth of a patient.

source.title: A Dentist Checking On Her Patient
source.author: Andrea Piacquadio

examples: A postal worker brings mail to my house every day.
